Silver

Silver

Name: Silver

Formula: Ag

Atomic Number: 47

Group: 11

Block: d

Relative Atomic Mass: 107.868

Discovery Date: 3000BC

Appearance: Relatively soft, shiny metal.

Uses:

  • Jewellery
  • Tableware
  • Car Alloys
